item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

What new reality do you want to create for yourself in 2012?

Last week we discussed the difference between Resolutions and Intentions. Then chose to set some NEW, YEARS INTENTIONS. Yet, intentions stay stagnant unless we move into action. This is where the Law of Attraction comes in. The first step to manifestation is to visualize what you want, Clarity.   

And, it is Clarity that has created this NEW WEEKLY GROUP. This intimate group will consist of 10-15 Creators who really want to manifest a change in their life. We have begun to set an intention in all areas of life and we eventually more to focusing on one or two aspects. Meeting will include Discussion, Meditation, Visualization, Vision Boarding, & more. 

Let's get together to discuss setting intentions for what we really want to see happen for us this year.

Join us in connecting with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson and creating the change we desire.

We will be meeting from 7:00pm-8:30pm in the back room of Panera Bread for the first until February and then move to a more private location.

Panera is in a plaza of shops, next to Marshalls.

See you there!

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will disclose location after signing up

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: 2012 The Year of Change - A New Weekly Meet-up
